oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Podcast - Memphis Room Music Show - Episode 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Holliday, Eldon; music; University of Memphis; Evans, David; High Water Records; blues; Hemphill, Jessie Mae; Hurt, "Mississippi" John; The Fieldstones;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The second episode of the Memphis Room Music Show podcast, hosted by Eldon "Chip" Holliday. In this episode, Dr. David Evans sits down with Chip Holliday to discuss the creation and history of the University of Memphis' High Water Records. Since 1979 Dr. Evans has been recording local and regional blues, jazz, and gospel artists for the label. Listen as they discuss his personal interest in blues music, play some tracks, and discuss the importance of preservation in the digital era.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Holliday, Eldon
